description: Installs Node.js, nvm, yarn, pnpm, and needed dependencies.

version.description: Select or enter a Node.js version to install

nodeGypDependencies.description: Install dependencies to compile native node modules (node-gyp)?

nvmInstallPath.description: The path where NVM will be installed.

installYarnUsingApt.description: On Debian & Ubuntu systems, you can choose whether to install Yarn globally via APT. If this option is set to false, Yarn will be set up via Corepack instead. This setting does not apply to other Linux distributions, where Yarn is always installed using Corepack (with a fallback to installation via NPM in case of an error).
